attributes.source:
---
title: Get started with Dl3-Kershk
description: How to get started with Dl3-Kershk
---

# {% $markdoc.frontmatter.title %}

If you would like to contribute to our system then please feel free to do so by following the next steps

## Clone Dl3-Kershk

```git
git clone https://github.com/AhmedAlamoudi192/Dl3-Kershk
```

## Install Dl3-Kershk

Install Dl3-Kershk :

```shell
cd backend
npm install
```

or

```shell
cd backend
yarn add 
```

## Check out the examples frontends

Install Frontends example :

```shell
cd example frontend
npm install
```

or

```shell
cd example frontend
yarn add 
```

## Running either projects

to run the project all you have to do is run one (depending on what you used previously) the following commands

```shell
npm run dev
```

or

```shell
yarn dev 
```

## Next steps

- [Commonly asked questions](/docs/faq)
